_source.text: A credit is a credit, and a B&M credit is always better than a boomerang or a flying dutchman.

text: A credit is a credit, and a B&M credit is always **better** **than** a **boomerang** or a flying dutchman.

_source.text: actually this is on full zoom 90mm, so cropping as Frank mod and adding canvas on the top as pam mod looks better than mine.

text: actually this is on full **zoom** 90mm, so cropping as Frank mod and adding **canvas** on the top as pam mod looks **better** **than** mine.
